for_sales.sales_text: GRP gaffer for sale, based in Hollowshore. With a very good race record, she is an extremely quick and fun sloop to sail. 5k offers considered

boat.full_description: Based in Hollowshore, this is a super fast gaffer which has so much pocket sized fun.
boat.name: Fifi
boat.short_description: This is a classic gaff sloop which exceeds all expectations, she is super fast for her size and so much fun to sail.
